Question
========
Which statement(s) is/are true?  
   
I. The “multiple correlation” is the correlation between the observed
values of the dependent variable and the predicted scores based on the
regression.  
II. The “proportional reduction in error” in a multivariate regression
is the sum of all proportions explained variance in the dependent
variable by all independent variables separately.

Answerlist
----------
* Both statements I and II are true.
* Statement I is true and statement II is false.
* Statement I is false and statement II is true.
* Both statements I and II are false.

Solution
========










Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
